articles.title: Leonids meteor shower 2022: Here is how to spot it - Eastern Daily Press
articles.description: The Leonids meteor shower is peaking on November 17 - here is how you can see it.
articles.content:
Active between November 6 and 30, the Leonids shower will peak on November 17 and 18.
The meteors are characterised by fast, bright meteors with fine trains.
